name: Texas Brownies
author: Donna Menz
instructions: In a large bowl combine the flour and sugar. In a saucepan com- bine oleo, shortening, water and cocoa. Stir and heat to boiling. Pour boiling mixture over the flour and sugar. Add the buttermilk, eggs, baking soda and vanilla. Mix well using a high speed mixer. Pour in a well buttered 17 1⁄2 x 11 inch jelly roll pan. Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until brownies test done in the center.
